issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Step: Enter valid url and click on 'Enter' button from Keyboard or 'Go' button from the browser.
Step: Click on 'Sign Up' link from 'Home / Login' page.
Step: Sign up screen loaded.
Step: Entering integers from username and entering valid values for remaining fields.
Step: Click on 'Sign Up' button

Step: Should display error message.
"Username contains only alphabets".


But it is accepting integers. Please refer below mentioned user details.
Username: 12345678
fields.summary: User name accepting integers during new user creation

comments.body:
Hello,

What are you exactly referring about? Can you please provide some additional context?

Thank you
